document_data.caption: A map showing the Gentle Rest on the High Road.
document_data.name: Gentle Rest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gentle Rest''' was an [[inn]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The inn stood five stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Gentle Rest was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] on the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and [[Spoils Alley]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5294a}}
document_data.Inhabitants: The inn's owner in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, was [[Torst Urlivan]].
